Text: RE Campaign Planning CommitteeSupper on Thursday sounds great We can plan to eat right after your meetings end I will get tickets for the play Thursday night if you are interested I still go to all the plays If youre not interested Ill just go on Sunday Im looking forward to getting together again I can show you our new NMR If I can do a little campaigning dont repeat what I say here I dont want to get in any trouble Im enclosing the brief notes from a science building meeting last fall about the campaign We hope the campaign isnt just about bricks and mortar It would be a great opportunity to strengthen the sciences s and below were particularly important to many people is getting scholarship money to attract good students into the sciences is endowment for equipment we have a growing endowment in chemistry and biology Ill tell you about it when you are here It is just that science has become very expensive and we would like for this endowment to grow is just to look at remodeling the science building chemistry doesnt need this as much as biology and psychology I dont want you to push for these particular things they would know you had been lobbied It is just that I hope there will be some attempt to strengthen academics in the campaign Im also aware that some of our requests may not be the most fundable items It is always easier to raise big money on bricks and mortar See you soon Im off to class Doc Science Building Meeting August Present Biology Chemistry Computer Math Psych and Physics faculty Ideas presented for funding possibilities in the upcoming campaign that would benefit the academic programs offered in HT Science Building Presidential scholars To maintaining a steady stream of very good students in science and math classes Many faculty thought this was very important Endowment for equipment and computers Build the endowment for science equipment and computers to help maintain a constant and enhanced supply of money to buy equipment and computers Remodeling HT science building Air condition some labs and lecture rooms Remodel laboratory space for present needs of our programs look at whole building Endowment for Faculty salaries Endowment for student research Endowment for summer programs Endowment for travel funds Endowment for named lecturers Staffing concerns Possibility of endowed chairs lab technician andor equipment repair technician We know the lab and equipment repair people are ongoing expenses but maybe money could be raised to endow them These are the ideas that were suggested at our meeting Different faculty would have different priorities within this list We all agreed it is extremely important to raise some endowment funds in the next campaign for the direct benefit of the programs offered in HT

RE Campaign Planning Committeewould be great if Mark could join us How long are you going to be in town If you are only going to be here that night maybe it would be better to just sit around and chat It really doesnt matter to me Doc Original Message From mailto Sent Sunday April AM To Subject RE Campaign Planning Committee Thanks for your note Ill keep those items in mind It seems pretty clear to me that the Pres has something of a bricks and mortar agenda and some gentle nudges towards a more academic path may be needed I asked Mark Kopinski who is also coming to the planning meeting if he wanted to join us for dinner so Ive sent him a note asking if he wants to go to the play or not Ill let you know what he says I have mixed feelings since Id like to see the play but would regret the time we could have spent chatting

RE Trustees meetingCome over to my house on Saturday afternoon around We can go over to Tahiti at the ZBT house for a short while I dont know many of the brothers anymore but I still like to go to Tahiti At we can go to the Barnstormer for supper You are just in time to help celebrate my birthday Dick and Sandy Giese Dick and Lorna Valentine Pete and Lynn Loomis Director of Building and Grounds and Perry and Dalene White Music Dept for Perry and Dalene works for Dick Valentine will all be present This will be the third year we have gotten together Pete and I both have birthdays next week We will all get a little crazy together Looking forward to seeing you Doc Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Subject Trustees meeting Doc Ill be in town through Sunday morning Any chance we can get together for dinner Saturday eve Mark
